snippet: Security forces clashed late on Thursday with Bedouins in the northern Sinai Peninsula, an Egyptian security official said, and one Bedouin was killed in the fighting.
abstract: Security forces clash with Bedouins in the northern Sinai Peninsula of Egypt after police arrest a Bedouin on suspicion of theft; one tribesman is killed in the fighting.
lead_paragraph: Security forces clashed late on Thursday with Bedouins in the northern Sinai Peninsula, an Egyptian security official said, and one Bedouin was killed in the fighting.

headline.main: Egypt: Bedouins Clash With the Police
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Bedouins Clash With the Police
